rows.text_1: This week, we want to talk about the environment you **CREATE** for your child.

text_1.eng: This week, we want to talk about the environment you **CREATE** for your child.

text_2.eng: A positive environment helps children feel safe and helps them learn.

rows.text_2: A positive environment helps children feel safe and helps them learn.

text_2.eng:
In ParentApp for Kids, we use the image of a garden to think about what children need in their lives to grow and thrive. 

Let’s see how **creating a positive environment** forms part of the garden image.

rows.text_2:
In ParentApp for Kids, we use the image of a garden to think about what children need in their lives to grow and thrive. 

Let’s see how **creating a positive environment** forms part of the garden image.
rows.title: The ParentApp Garden

rows.text_1: In the same way that all plants need sunlight to grow, all children need praise and positive encouragement from their caregivers.

text_1.eng: In the same way that all plants need sunlight to grow, all children need praise and positive encouragement from their caregivers.

media_transcript.eng:
Children thrive when caregivers respond to them with warmth, acceptance and praise. Just as the sun rises and sets every day, try to give your child some positive attention every day. 

Remember that what gets light will grow. When parents give positive attention to good behaviour with praise, children will be encouraged to behave that way more often in the future.
